mapper.select: SELECT u.* ,p.pro_name,p.pro_code,c.city_name,area_name FROM `user` as u INNER JOIN province p on user_provinse = p.id INNER JOIN city c on user_city = c.id INNER JOIN area a ON user_area = a.id where username=#{username}
mapper.update: UPDATE `user` SET nickname=#{nickname}, qq_card=#{qq_card},email=#{email}, sex=#{sex},phone=#{phone},user_provinse=#{user_provinse}, user_city=#{user_city},user_area=#{user_area} ,`desc`=#{desc} WHERE username=#{username}
